article: concession talks between the united auto workers and the detroit three shifted into an odd phase saturday as negotiations broke off with general motors corp. , slowed at chrysler llc and picked up speed at ford motor co. , financially the healthiest of the three , according to people briefed on the bargaining .
abstract: gm chrysler labor talks slow as deadline nears
